QuestData.Title: A Weapon of the Horde
QuestData.Description: It would seem I underestimated your initial value.$b$bWe will have need of your kind in the coming war. I plan to hunt these demons to the ends of Azeroth, and your kind will be the arrow I shall loose upon them.$b$bTell your Illidari within Orgrimmar to make ready to serve the Horde.$b$bBut make no mistake, your kind once served the Betrayer. Betray me, and there is no world you can run to that will save you from my vengeance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Elthyn Da'rai at the Illidari camp in Orgrimmar.
